moves.name: Fury Cutter
moves.effect: Its power increases when used in succession.

moves.name: X Speed All
moves.effect: Sharply raises the Speed of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Strike Together!
moves.effect: Raises the Attack and Speed of all allied sync pairs.

passives.name: First Aid 2
passives.description: Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.

passives.name: Endurance
passives.description: If the Pokémon enters battle with full HP, allows it to endure the next hit it takes that would reduce it to 0 HP.
